general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage. Apply remedies for high temperatures in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves, cover vegetable seedlings, monitor water temperature for fingerlings. Yellow stem borer management for paddy, blast disease management, tobacco caterpillar management, early shoot borer management for sugarcane, brinjal shoot and fruit borer, whitefly infestation prevention in okra seeds, onion storage advisory, mango hopper control.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical
Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer
Irrigate the crop frequently during hot months
High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop
Irrigate the crop and prevent water stagnation
Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10-liter water in root zone
In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30Â°C
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during the daytime
Check the migration of caterpillars by dusting with Chlorpyriphos 1.5% D @ 10kg around the field
Check the migration of caterpillars by dusting with Chlorpyriphos 1.5% D @ 10kg around the field
For chemical control, spray Novaluron 5.25% + Indoxacarb 4.25% @ 400-ml/acre or Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9 CS @ 300ml or Flubendiamide 20% WG @ 120 grams
To prevent whitefly infestation, seeds should be treated with Imidacloprid @ 7-gram/kg of seeds before sowing
After harvesting, cut the tops leaving 2.0-2.5cm above bulb
Dry harvested bulb in a well-ventilated concrete floored room for longer storage
To control mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 5ml/15 liters of water or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 3ml/15 liters of water or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 4g/15 liters of water
